entry.title: Snowflake Ventures Invests in Eppo to Bring Experimentation to the AI Data Cloud |
entry.summary: Weâ€™re investing in Eppo, a next-gen experimentation platform. With Eppoâ€™s end-to-end A/B testing integrated directly into the Snowflake AI Data Cloud, businesses can now run experiments on AI-powered ...
entry.content: Weâ€™re investing in Eppo, a next-gen experimentation platform. With Eppoâ€™s end-to-end A/B testing integrated directly into the Snowflake AI Data Cloud, businesses can now run experiments on AI-powered features and product growth with the same data used for business reporting. This partnership will help teams tie product development efforts to real business metrics and build a data-driven experimentation culture.

entry.title: Govern an Open Lakehouse with Snowflake Open Catalog |
entry.summary: Snowflake Open Catalog, a managed service for Apache Polaris (incubating), enables secure interoperability for data lakes and lakehouses, simplifying data governance.
